msg.msgText:
A "LDAP" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update LDAP help imaserver update LDAP "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update LDAP "UserIdMap=*:cn"
Configuration items for "LDAP" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
